title: Stocks to Watch: Talking Markets with Gregg Fisher
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and deputy editor Ben Levisohn speak with Gregg Fisher, founder & portfolio manager of Quent Capital on the outlook for financial markets, industry sectors, and individual stocks.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and deputy editor Ben Levisohn speak with Gregg Fisher, founder & portfolio manager of Quent Capital on the outlook for financial markets, industry sectors, and individual stocks.
